article.author: By CNN
article.mainText: To listen to an audio podcast, mouse over the title and click Play. Open iTunes to download and subscribe to podcasts. CNN has the best political director in the business and every morning Monday through Friday David Chalian will lay out what you need to know from the campaign trail and the world of politics. Discover and share new apps. Follow us on @AppStore. Discover and share new music, movies, TV, books, and more. Follow us @iTunes and discover new iTunes Radio Stations and the music we love.
article.title: CNN's The Daily DC
